Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. href="http://www.IndyStar.com/article/20110118/SPORTS03/110118012/Gene Huey-Gene Huey-surprised-being-fired-Colts-running-backs-coach&odyssey=mod|mostview"> Gene Huey `

CEO Eric Schmidt says Mountain View is preparing to spearhead a mobile revolution that will help redefine the role of the smartphone. According to Eric Schmidt , a handset will soon be capable of delivering streaming personalized information about where you are[ and] what you could do there in real-time and at scale. However, the CEO acknowledged that Google first needed to do some`` serious spadework,'' such as developing advanced LTE networks to carry massive and inevitable data loads.
